website_summaries.verdict: The Trendnet TEW-691GR 450Mbps Wireless-N gigabit router is a very fast single-band wireless router. Unfortunately, its good performance doesn't make up for its hefty price tag and lack of features.
pros: The Trendnet TEW-691GR 450Mbps Wireless-N gigabit router offers excellent close-range throughput performance
The router has a Web interface that's easy to use, and support for gigabit Ethernet
cons: The Trendnet TEW-691GR 450Mbps Wireless-N gigabit router's range throughput speeds could use some improvement
The router is expensive, doesn't have USB ports, and lacks support for dual-band and guest networking

customer_reviews.title: Not so bad not so good
customer_reviews.text: I went for this router to expand my wireless network of my home, and the item performs ok, speed is not that good, signal is poor, basically you will need a clear sight line to the router to get signal if there is any concrete in between you wont get signal. Cons: Signal is very poor for wireless. Materials are very cheap i felt that the router was going to brake apart when taking one of the RJ45 off from the back. Pros: Easy Install Basic configuration allows you to have your wifi ready. Gigabit ports Good transfer speed
customer_reviews.author: Rgvargas

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router to replace my non-working access point. I was going to use this as an access point s well. I was able to setup the configuration easy enough, as I have had a bit of experience with networking. The problem I had was that once plugged into the network, my other router (which is a TRENDnet as well) would assign it a new IP address. I could not get into the router administration to add or delete any other devices without reset all settings to their default values. The biggest issue for me was that it would constantly drop the connection with my wireless printer. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: good features, fast router, crappy signal strength
customer_reviews.text: weak weak signal. I am a network admin, so have experience in this area. This is the worst router I have ever owned. It is blazing fast....if you are in the same room. But when you go into other rooms in the house, the signal gets weak and spotty. And don't even think about getting signal upstairs. I ended up using an old Linksys upstairs...which outperforms this thing. The features are great, but if you need it for WiFi, forget it. It just isn't worth the family's frustration.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Poor administration interface and functionality
customer_reviews.text: This router has ok speed, though not as fast as I expected, and to be honest I didn't care for the speed after I saw the atrocious admin interface and the lack of functionality. I needed a good QoS engine, that at least allow me to setup priorities, this router simply doesn't have a QoS engine at all, plus it's missing a plethora of advanced options. I returned this product and bought the D-Link DIR-655 instead, I've been happy with the DIR-655. If you never use the admin interface of a router and like to pay a premium for supposedly faster speed, then this router maybe a good match for you. Otherwise, I wouldn't recommend this router.
customer_reviews.author: KoKo

customer_reviews.title: Blazing Fast
customer_reviews.text: Blazing Fast. This replaced my Linksys 802.11g. Only setup problem i had was with the router not Renewing or even obtaining an IP from the cable modem. My setup was as follows: Comcast --> RCA Cable Modem --> TRENDnet Router. This was apaprently a problem with the comcast cable modem having to be reset by simply calling comcast. This apparently releases the MAC and allows you to connect a new wifi router. Trendnet customer support was somewhat helpful but wanted me to do a "MAC Clone" which was leading nowhere. Hope this helps anyone else with this problem. Great product. Setup was fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Game time!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a kit in the house that games now this is the product of a life time, it will not let you down the regular router will not perform like this talking router. So step up and get gamming.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil of Nc

customer_reviews.title: It works but poor range
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 5 year old wireless router of another brand. This one doesn't seem to have near the range of the old one and it's sitting in the exact same spot. Otherwise, it works
customer_reviews.author: Robert J

customer_reviews.title: trend net does it again
customer_reviews.text: bought this to fix an issue with internet speed with my old roomates., when i was living there we had lghtning fast connection with little worry
customer_reviews.author: Jason C. Laurenzo

customer_reviews.title: i still have it
customer_reviews.text: good product. works well. i never had a problem yet. hope it continues to work. and trend net has a 3 year warrantee on most of there products.
customer_reviews.author: happy lee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needs rebooting every week or so. Does not give full 1G speed on RJ45 ports.
customer_reviews.author: Computer Analyst

customer_reviews.title: New router
customer_reviews.text: Great, great, great buy. The thing works as advertised. Connecting it to the existing system was very easy; it's very efficient.
customer_reviews.author: BEST / EXCELLENT PRODUCTS

customer_reviews.title: Trendnet 450-TEW-691GR
customer_reviews.text: I really like the range of the Trendnet 450. I thought this would eliminate my primary home modem. Oh, well. I am happy that I have less buffering.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H Brown

customer_reviews.title: working as expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, works great with online gaming. Only problem has connecting a Majic Jack Plus but their customer service fixed all of my problems.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: I work as a software developer for internet companies (web hosting), so internet availability is something I know well. That being said, as a demanding user, this wireless router doesn't cut it. It suffers from rather frequently dropped connections. I don't honestly see a good reason to buy this wireless router. If you aren't going to notice its shortfalls, then you should be buying something cheaper anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Much improved over ethernet!
customer_reviews.text: I had just been using my friends wi-fi for my laptops, and my Ethernet for my ps3, and this router gave me enhanced speed and quality!
customer_reviews.author: JMac

customer_reviews.title: Router review
customer_reviews.text: The speed of the Trendnet TEW-691GR is definitely noticeable. The range I get is not as much as I had hoped but in all fairness I am sttill using a G wifi card in my laptop. For the price it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these for my entire house, all three floors have great access and no one is complaining anymore.
customer_reviews.author: RPonce

customer_reviews.title: dropped wireless signals
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately I did not have good experience. My wireless signal kept dropping. As an emergency solution I bought a cheap wireless G netgear. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I tried getting the router to work but I never could. If your a tech wiz then this is the router for you.
customer_reviews.author: John T Keaton Jr

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised !
customer_reviews.text: Works great! only problem i see is with Bridging :( but other then that it works really good! not issues so far have 2 of them
customer_reviews.author: zbug

customer_reviews.title: junk!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap! $150, 35 hours trouble shooting at the least, and 1 hour with microsoft tech support I find out my damn router is failing / failed what ever. Another night up past 2am trying to recieve my home email. May burn this 450mbs junk box. Grrrrr
customer_reviews.author: RWP72

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IF YOU HAVE MAGIC JACK 4 PHONE
customer_reviews.text: This router does not work with Magic Jack....PERIOD; no matter what you do to the router. Spent two days troubleshooting everything under the sun. Bought a Linksys 900n and all problems are solved.
customer_reviews.author: DUCKO

customer_reviews.title: signal
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a better signal in a wireless router. This item didn't do any better then what I had. I do not believe it was the item it is the placement where I have my router and modem.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Just got it and it looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I just got it and havent installed it but its small, nice looking and very powerfull ill give it a shot im sure ill love it.
customer_reviews.author: gianni

product_meta.title: TRENDnet N450 Wireless Gigabit Router, TEW-691GR
product_meta.description:
TRENDnet's 450 Mbps Wireless N Gigabit Router, model TEW-691GR, redefines wireless router performance. This router's raw horsepower seamlessly streams HD movies to your entertainment center, transfers content from countless users, and generates record wireless coverage. Gigabit Wide Area Network and Local Area Network ports transfer wired data fast. An Energy Star certified power adapter and embedded GREENnet technology reduce power consumption. Advanced Multiple Input Multiple Output (MIMO) antenna technology with three spatial streams per antenna generates a maximum theoretical wireless throughput of 450 Mbps. Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS) integrates other WPS supported wireless adapters at the touch of a button. The latest in wireless encryption and a secure firewall protect your digital network. WMM Quality of Service (QoS) technology prioritizes gaming, Internet calls, and video streams. LEDs on the front of the router convey device status.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: High-speed data rates of up to 450 Mbps using an IEEE 802.11n connection
Stream video, download files, talk online, and play games all at the same time
Connect computers with one-touch Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS)
4 x 10/100/1000 Mbps Auto-MDIX LAN ports, 1 x 10/100/1000 Mbps WAN port (Internet)
Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) for auto discovery and support for device configuration of Internet applications like RTP/RTSP, SIP, FTP, TFTP, NTP, and SMTP

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.1 out of 5 stars57 ratings3.1 out of 5 stars
